label: AB4C6D_mP24_13_e_aeg_3g_f-001
title: $\beta$-Cu$_{4}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)Cl Structure
comments:
Cu$_{4}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)Cl may also be found as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C6D_oP48_57_d_2de_3e_c-001}{$\alpha$-Cu$_{4}$O$_{2}$(VO$_{4}$)Cl}. 
 (Ginga, 2024) give the structural information in the $P2/n$ setting of space group \#13. This makes the unit cell pseudo-orthorhombic, with $\beta$ = 90.389$^\circ$.  AFLOW translates this to the standard $P2/c$ setting, defining the new $\bf{a}_3$ as $\bf{a}_1 + \bf{a}_{3}$ from the old lattice. 
 (Ginga, 2024) mistakenly give the vanadium (4f) position as (x 3/4 3/4), which is incompatible with the $P2/n$ setting.  The CIF file found using the \href{https://www.ccdc.cam.ac.uk/structures/}{CCDC search function} corrects this to (3/4 y 3/4), which we follow.
